title: Mortgage Rates Today, Thursday, December 4: Lower for Now
description: TL;DR: Mortgage rates stay low as markets bet on a Fed cut.
content:
Mortgage rates went on a stomach-churning ride to start the week, but at least for now, rates have settled. Even better, they've settled at the low end of their recent range.
